His imprisonment leaves Brazil's conservative base without a clear leader for the 2026 elections.

Doctors confirmed Shrinivas was diagnosed with angina, not a heart attack, and an angiography revealed no blockages, easing concerns.

title: Ootupurai, the traditional feeding house in Kanniyakumari temples
description: Ootupurai, where Brahmins were served free meals, was once a familiar institution across southern Travancore and Kanniyakumari district which remained part of Kerala until 1957. Although the British administration ordered the discontinuation of this system in 1922, it survived in several temples long after the decree.

While Tewary blamed the anti-foreigner agitation led by Aasu and AAGSP, Mehta pointed to earlier attacks by migrant Muslims.

title: 'Follow your passion' is worst advice: Here's why Mark Cuban says it misleads professionals
description: Mark Cuban challenges the common advice to 'follow your passion'. He argues that consistent effort leads to skill, which then fosters enjoyment and eventually passion. Time invested in work is a better indicator of future success than abstract excitement. Professionals should focus on where their effort is directed, as this reveals true career direction and opportunity.

Greta Thunberg banned from Venice for pouring green dye into Grand Canal in protest
description: Greta Thunberg and a group of environmental activists undertook a shocking protest in Venice, dyeing the Grand Canal bright green to raise awareness about insufficient fossil fuel regulations at a UN climate summit. However, their bold actions resulted in a two-day prohibition and fines, as many deemed their approach disrespectful to the historic UNESCO site.

title: Amazon's AI power play: Tech giant vetoes third-party tools; 'Kiro' takes centre stage
description: Amazon has directed its software engineers to cease using third-party AI coding tools like OpenAI's Codex and Anthropic's Claude Code, mandating exclusive use of its proprietary system, Kiro. This strategic move aims to bolster Amazon's competitive standing against rivals OpenAI and Google in the rapidly expanding AI code assistant market.

title: Gemini 3.0 launch: Salesforce CEO says won't use ChatGPT again; praises Google’s AI model
description: Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff has declared a permanent switch from ChatGPT to Google's Gemini 3.0 after a two-hour trial, citing its superior reasoning, speed, and multimedia capabilities. This endorsement signals intense competition for OpenAI, with even its CEO acknowledging rivals' advancements while emphasizing their own pursuit of superintelligence.
